/*totalDAO.totalWriteList*/
SELECT B.INX,B.TITLE,B.CONTENT,B.MENU,B.ID ,DATE(B.DT)AS DT,B.RNUM FROM( SELECT A.INX ,A.TITLE,A.CONTENT , A.ID,A.MENU, A.DT ,@ROWNUM := @ROWNUM +1 AS RNUM FROM ( SELECT INX,TITLE,ID,BOARD_DATE AS DT, '자유게시판' AS MENU , CONTENT FROM BOARD WHERE ID=#ID# UNION ALL SELECT INX,TITLE,ID,INSERT_DATE AS DT, 'Q&A게시판' AS MENU , CONTENT FROM QA WHERE ID=#ID# UNION ALL SELECT INX,TITLE,ID,INSERT_DATE AS DT,'등업게시판' AS MENU ,CONTENT FROM LEVEL WHERE ID=#ID# UNION ALL SELECT INX,TITLE,ID,INSERT_DATE AS DT, '공지사항' AS MENU,CONTENT FROM NOTICE WHERE ID = #ID# ) A )B ,(SELECT @ROWNUM :=0) RNUM
B.TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchText#,'%')
ORDER BY DT DESC
